member.name: P:C1.Phone.Gauge.C1GaugeDecorator.To
member.summary: Gets/sets the value where the decorator ends. Set to double.NaN to bind to Gauge's maximum (default).

member.summary: Builds transformation required to place an element in a specific value position within the .

member.param: Value where the geometry has to start.
Value where the geometry has to end.
Relative (0-1) starting offset of the element in the y-axis.
Relative (0-1) ending offset of the element in the y-axis.
Relative (0-1) staring width of the geometry.
Relative (0-1) ending width of the geometry.
member.returns: Geometry used to represent the fill of the element.

member.summary: The ratio of the width of the gauge to its height.

member.name: P:C1.Phone.Gauge.C1RadialGauge.StartAngle
member.summary: Start angle for the axis. 0 is the topmost point of the circumference.

member.name: P:C1.Phone.Gauge.C1RadialGauge.SweepAngle
member.summary: Sweep angle for the values. The Maximum value will be placed at StartAngle + SweepAngle.

member.name: P:C1.Phone.Gauge.C1RadialGauge.Radius
member.summary: Logical radius of the .
member.remarks: 1 represents half of the Min (Width, Height) of the control and 0 represents 0.

member.name: P:C1.Phone.Gauge.C1RadialGauge.PointerOrigin
member.summary: Logical coordinates of the pointer origin of the .
member.remarks: The Point (0, 0) is the top-left corner of the control and the Point (0.5, 0.5) is the center of the control.
